hero.title: Wood-fired Pizza POLE POLE
hero.catch: Slowly, little by little, enjoy wood-fired pizza in a place of peace.

notification.temp_closure: [Notice of Temporary Closure] We will be closed on Sunday, July 20th.
notification.summer_holiday: [Notice of Summer Holiday] We will be closed from Tue, Aug 12th to Wed, Aug 20th.

about.title: A Place Called POLE POLE
about.description_html:
POLE POLE means 'let's take it easy' in Swahili.
Take a short break from your busy life and listen to the crackling sound of firewood.
We want you to have a rich and fulfilling time.
That's the feeling embedded in this place.

commitment.title: One by One, with Heart
commitment.description: We bake our pizzas quickly in a wood-fired oven over 400°C. The best bake for the best taste. Please enjoy a piece filled with POLE POLE's dedication.

pizza_highlight.title: Our Proud Wood-fired Pizza
pizza_highlight.margherita_desc: The classic pizza with tomato, basil, and mozzarella.
pizza_highlight.formaggi_desc: Four kinds of cheese enjoyed with homemade apple paste.

gallery.title: Our Commitment to Space
gallery.description: The interior of POLE POLE features the warmth of wood and open windows. A single-plank counter, spacious table seats. You can spend a comfortable time alone or with someone special.

final_cta.title: Let's meet at POLE POLE
final_cta.description_html:
With hot pizza baked in a wood-fired oven and a peaceful space.
We sincerely look forward to your visit.

about.title: Our Story
about.heading:
"POLE POLE" 
"Slowly, slowly" "Take it easy"
about.content1:
In today's rapidly changing and increasingly uncertain world,
in our hectic daily lives,
important moments tend to be put on the back burner.
about.content2:
Stepping away from such daily routine,
there might be moments to listen to the voice of your heart.
Wouldn't that be nice?
about.content3:
We hope that POLE POLE can become
such a place of tranquility.
about.content4:
May the road always be before you.
May the wind always be at your back.

Let's take it easy, POLE POLE.

meta.title: Our Story | Wood-Fired Pizza POLE POLE
meta.description: A message from Wood-Fired Pizza POLE POLE. We share our thoughts on spending spiritually rich moments in a place of relaxation, slowly and steadily.

menu.title: Menu
menu.heading: Wood-Fired Pizza Menu
menu.description: Enjoy authentic pizza baked quickly in a wood-fired oven exceeding 400 degrees.

meta.title: Menu | Wood-Fired Pizza POLE POLE - Higashihiroshima Saijo Pizza Restaurant
meta.description: Menu of wood-fired Pizza POLE POLE in Higashihiroshima Saijo. Authentic Neapolitan pizza, local ingredients, handmade dough. Open for lunch and cafe. Takeout available.
meta.imageAlt: Wood-fired oven at Pizza POLE POLE in Higashihiroshima Saijo

items.name: Marinara
items.desc: Marinara means 'of the sea' and is said to have been beloved by Neapolitan sailors long ago. It contains no cheese, allowing you to taste the dough and ingredients.

items.name: Margherita
items.desc: A famous pizza created in 1889 for Queen Margherita and said to be loved by the queen. It represents the Italian flag with tomato sauce (red), mozzarella (white), and basil (green). There are various theories, but it's a lovely story.

items.name: Porcetta Varieta
items.desc: A hearty pizza with homemade pancetta (bacon) made from domestic pork and sea salt, and mozzarella well-balanced with tomato sauce.

items.name: Nori Japone
items.desc: A refreshing Japanese-style pizza with homemade Ise Bay seaweed sauce, shrimp, and mozzarella. The pickled vegetables add a nice touch.

items.name: Quattro Formaggi
items.desc: Enjoy this rich four-cheese pizza with our homemade apple paste. Formaggi means 'cheese' and is rich in protein, fat, vitamins, and minerals, helping with fatigue recovery and high blood pressure prevention. But please don't overeat!

items.name: Seasonal Pizza
items.desc: Pizza made with homemade vegetables and local, domestic seasonal ingredients.
items.price: Please check the blackboard in store

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: Wood-Fired Pizza POLE POLE (hereinafter referred to as 'our restaurant') does not acquire, store, or use customers' personal information. This website does not have functions that require input or transmission of personal information (such as contact forms).

section1.title: 1. Acquisition of Personal Information
section1.content: Our restaurant does not acquire customers' personal information through this website.

section2.title: 2. Purpose of Use of Personal Information
section2.content: We do not acquire or use personal information at all.

section3.title: 3. Provision of Personal Information to Third Parties
section3.content: Our restaurant does not provide personal information to third parties.

section4.title: 4. Access Analysis and Cookies
section4.content: This website may use access analysis tools to improve services, but we do not acquire information that identifies individuals.

section5.title: 5. Changes to Privacy Policy
section5.content: The content of this policy may be revised without notice as necessary.

section6.title: 6. Inquiries
section6.content: For questions regarding this privacy policy, please inquire at our restaurant.
